sn4.23:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn4.23:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā godhiko isigilipasse viharati kāḷasilāyaṃ.
sn4.23:1.4: Atha kho āyasmā godhiko appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto sāmayikaṃ cetovimuttiṃ phusi.
sn4.23:1.5: Atha kho āyasmā godhiko tamhā sāmayikāya cetovimuttiyā parihāyi.
sn4.23:1.6: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā godhiko appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto sāmayikaṃ cetovimuttiṃ phusi.
sn4.23:1.7: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā godhiko tamhā sāmayikāya cetovimuttiyā parihāyi.
sn4.23:1.8: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā godhiko appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto sāmayikaṃ cetovimuttiṃ phusi.
sn4.23:1.9: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā godhiko tamhā …pe… parihāyi.
sn4.23:1.10: Catutthampi kho āyasmā godhiko appamatto …pe… vimuttiṃ phusi.
sn4.23:1.11: Catutthampi kho āyasmā godhiko tamhā …pe… parihāyi.
sn4.23:1.12: Pañcamampi kho āyasmā godhiko …pe… cetovimuttiṃ phusi.
sn4.23:1.14: Chaṭṭhampi kho āyasmā godhiko appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto sāmayikaṃ cetovimuttiṃ phusi.
sn4.23:1.15: Chaṭṭhampi kho āyasmā godhiko tamhā sāmayikāya cetovimuttiyā parihāyi.
sn4.23:1.16: Sattamampi kho āyasmā godhiko appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto sāmayikaṃ cetovimuttiṃ phusi.
sn4.23:2.4: Atha kho māro pāpimā āyasmato godhikassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi:
sn4.23:6.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmatā godhikena satthaṃ āharitaṃ hoti.
sn4.23:6.2: Atha kho bhagavā “māro ayaṃ pāpimā” iti viditvā māraṃ pāpimantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn4.23:8.2: “āyāma, bhikkhave, yena isigilipassaṃ kāḷasilā tenupasaṅkamissāma yattha godhikena kulaputtena satthaṃ āharitan”ti.
sn4.23:8.3: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ.
sn4.23:9.1: Atha kho bhagavā sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ yena isigilipassaṃ kāḷasilā tenupasaṅkami.
sn4.23:9.2: Addasā kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ godhikaṃ dūratova mañcake vivattakkhandhaṃ semānaṃ.
sn4.23:9.3: Tena kho pana samayena dhūmāyitattaṃ timirāyitattaṃ gacchateva purimaṃ disaṃ, gacchati pacchimaṃ disaṃ, gacchati uttaraṃ disaṃ, gacchati dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ, gacchati uddhaṃ, gacchati adho, gacchati anudisaṃ.
sn4.23:10.2: “passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, etaṃ dhūmāyitattaṃ timirāyitattaṃ gacchateva purimaṃ disaṃ, gacchati pacchimaṃ disaṃ, gacchati uttaraṃ disaṃ, gacchati dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ, gacchati uddhaṃ, gacchati adho, gacchati anudisan”ti?
sn4.23:10.4: “Eso kho, bhikkhave, māro pāpimā godhikassa kulaputtassa viññāṇaṃ samanvesati:
sn4.23:10.6: Appatiṭṭhitena ca, bhikkhave, viññāṇena godhiko kulaputto parinibbuto”ti.
sn4.23:10.7: Atha kho māro pāpimā beluvapaṇḍuvīṇaṃ ādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
